TopicTitle: Changing the altitude at which PQS disables

Articles.Content:
I need to change the altitude at which the PQS terrain system disables, for use in my mod. Anyone knows if this is possible?

I can see that kerbin's PQS always disables at 160 km altitude, whether you're using stock, RSS or whatever.

Edited April 25, 2015 by blackrack

Here's the code you want.

Unless by "in RSS too" you're implying that code doesn't work. :]
